# hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Hypervisor ](/documentation/hypervisor)

- [ hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:) ](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:))

-  hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:) 

Function# hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:)

macOS 26.0+

```
func hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(
    _ config: hv_vm_config_t,
    _ granule: hv_ipa_granule_t
) -> hv_return_t
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:)#parameters)

`config`Configuration.

`granule`Granule size.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:)#return-value)

HV_SUCCESS on success, an error code otherwise.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_set_ipa_granule(_:_:)#discussion)

Set the intermediate physical address granule size in virtual machine configuration.
